ComicInfo.Penciller: David Rubin,Jill Thompson,P. Craig Russell,Jill Thompson,David Rubín
ComicInfo.Summary:
Loki's strange children are discovered by the gods and forced into their dismal fates in a grand story of betrayal and destiny. Then, Thor comes to the goddess Freya's aid by taking her place in an unusual wedding that is, of course, Loki's fault.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | P. Craig Russell & Lovern Kindzierski | 1 | B | Variant Cover | David Mack | 2 |
